ThingDef.label: demon tentacles
ThingDef.description: A demon tentacle. Long and flexible, constantly leaking demonic fluids. Useless for humans.

ThingDef.label: demon penis
ThingDef.description: A demon penis. It's average humanlike size, constantly leaking demonic fluids. Useless for humans.

ThingDef.label: demon vagina
ThingDef.description: A demon vagina, full of small tentacles, constantly leaking demonic fluids. Useless for humans.

ThingDef.label: demon anus
ThingDef.description: A demon anus... full of tentacles. Useless for humans.
